example.code:
Get-EC2HostReservationOffering -Filter @{Name="instance-family";Values="m4"} | Where-Object PaymentOption -eq NoUpfront
CurrencyCode : Duration : 94608000 HourlyPrice : 1.307 InstanceFamily : m4 OfferingId : hro-0c1f234567890d9ab PaymentOption : NoUpfront UpfrontPrice : 0.000
CurrencyCode : Duration : 31536000 HourlyPrice : 1.830 InstanceFamily : m4 OfferingId : hro-04ad12aaaf34b5a67 PaymentOption : NoUpfront UpfrontPrice : 0.000
example.description: This example describes the Dedicated Host reservations that are available to purchase for the given filter 'instance-family' where PaymentOption is 'NoUpfront'
